Annotation.note:
Through the points of intersection of the tangents $DB$, $DC$ to the circumcircle $(O)$ of the triangle $ABC$ a parallel is drawn to the line touching $(O)$ at $A$. If this parallel meets $AB$ , $AC$ in $E$, $F$, show that $D$ bisects $EF$.
\begin{keywords} geometry theorem proving \end{keywords}
